CLaRK_document_dtd.dtd: <!ELEMENT document (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT folder (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT info (#PCDATA)> <!ELEMENT inputFiles (document*)> <!ELEMENT key EMPTY> <!ATTLIST key expr CDATA #REQUIRED order (asc|desc) #IMPLIED trim (y|n) #IMPLIED normalize (y|n) #IMPLIED number (y|n) #IMPLIED reverse (y|n) #IMPLIED tokenizer CDATA #IMPLIED prefix (LC|I|RC|COM) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT keys (key+)> <!ELEMENT mode EMPTY> <!ATTLIST mode type (new|overwrite) "overwrite" extension CDATA #IMPLIED save (y|n) #IMPLIED overwrite (y|n) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT multiple (folder,output,mode,inputFiles?,outputFiles?)> <!ELEMENT output EMPTY> <!ATTLIST output type (separate|united) "separate" ufn CDATA #IMPLIED dtdname CDATA #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT outputFiles (document*)> <!ELEMENT sortquery (xpath?,keys?,info?,multiple?)> <!ATTLIST sortquery type (DTD|Advanced) #IMPLIED > <!ELEMENT xpath (#PCDATA)>
